title: Please help me identify this 'trash/handwritten' font
content:
Hi There  
I need the font name for the 'love' in the 'love and lace' logo:  
 [https://www.facebook.com/pages/Love-and-Lace/584597184918186](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130028/https:/www.facebook.com/pages/Love-and-Lace/584597184918186 "https://www.facebook.com/pages/Love-and-Lace/584597184918186")

Thank you!

Font: 

 Lemonade 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130028/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lllogo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130028/http:/typophile.com/files/lllogo1.jpg) | 18.25 KB |
| [lllogo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130028/http:/typophile.com/files/lllogo.png) | 33.2 KB |
author: Lovia

comments.content: Very close to **[Lemonade](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130028/http:/www.dafont.com/lemonade2.font?text=Love&psize=l)** by Rachel Lauren Adams [Free for personal use]
